definition: to stand someone up
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
pigeon/dove
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You're looking at a guy who could very well get stood up by a stray cat tonight.
sentences.chinese: 在你面前是一位今晚很可能被流浪猫放鸽子的男士。

sentences.english: The way to cure flaking is to demonstrate your value to a chick.
sentences.chinese: 医治被放鸽子的办法是向这个雏证明你的价值。

sentences.english: What could you have done differently to ensure that your prospect showed up to that appointment?
sentences.chinese: 这回你该怎么做才能保证你不会再被放鸽子呢？

sentences.english: Today, I got stood up because my date decided it would be more fun to chase a tornado instead.
sentences.chinese: 今天我被放鸽子了，因为男朋友想去追一只龙卷风。

sentences.english: I stood her up last week. She properly did it to get even with me.
sentences.chinese: 上礼拜她被我放鸽子，所以她可能是在报复我。

sentences.english: Mary got stood up by the blind date.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽被约好跟她相亲的人放鸽子了。

sentences.english: Susan stood me up last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我被苏珊放鸽子了。

definition: to ditch sb (slang)
to miss an appointment
to miss an appointment
to add sb to one's blacklist (on a cellphone, or in instant messaging software etc)/abbr. for 拉到黑名單|拉到黑名单
to skip work/to sneak out of work early
to arrive late
(Internet slang) end of friendship/friendship over!
(slang) to hook up for a one night stand/booty call
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
paying more attention to a lover than friends (idiom)/to value sex over friendship
person hired to lure customers to high-priced restaurants
to ask sb out (on a date etc)
(coll.) to ride in sb else's car to save money/to ride on a train or bus without buying a ticket (fare-dodging)
to restrict/to agree to a contract/offer/bid
to break off relations/to break with sb
to oversleep
